blocks.heading: Centrally store, access and deploy secrets

collectionCards.description: Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Get started here.

collectionCards.description: Manage Vault environment as well as your secrets using Vault UI.

blocks.heading: HashiCorp Well-Architected Framework
blocks.subheading: Learn about recommended best practices on HashiCorp products.

collectionCards.description:
Implement the operational excellence pillar strategies to enable your organization to build and ship products quickly and efficiently; including changes, updates, and upgrades.

The foundation of cloud adoption is infrastructure provisioning. Enable your team to focus on development by creating safe, consistent, and reliable workflows for deployment. Standardized processes allow teams to work efficiently and more easily adapt to changes in technology or business requirements.
collectionCards.heading: Operational Excellence

collectionCards.description: Architect workloads to perform within expectations and meet resiliency and recovery targets.
collectionCards.heading: Reliability

collectionCards.description: Implement security best practices to secure your applications, protect your network, manage sensitive data, manage identity and access, and build security controls.
collectionCards.heading: Security

product.name: Vault

metadata.title: Vault by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Vault handles leasing, key revocation, key rolling, auditing, and provides secrets as a service through a unified API.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

packageManagers.label: Ubuntu/Debian
commands: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install vault

product.description: Learn about secrets management and data protection with HashiCorp Vault.
